line_1: AH, why this boding start? this sudden pain,

line_1: That wings my pulse, and shoots from vein to vein?
line_2: AH, why this boding start? this sudden pain,

line_1: What mean, regardless of yon midnight bell,
line_2: These earth-born visions saddening o'er my cell?

line_1: These earth-born visions saddening o'er my cell?
line_2: What mean, regardless of yon midnight bell,

line_1: What strange disorder prompts these thoughts to glow?
line_2: These sighs to murmur, and these tears to flow?

line_1: These sighs to murmur, and these tears to flow?
line_2: What strange disorder prompts these thoughts to glow?

line_1: 'Tis she, 'tis Eloisa's form restor'd,
line_2: Once a pure saint, and more than saints ador'd:

line_1: Once a pure saint, and more than saints ador'd:
line_2: 'Tis she, 'tis Eloisa's form restor'd,

line_1: She comes in all her killing charms confest,
line_2: Glares thro' the gloom, and pours upon my breast,

line_1: Glares thro' the gloom, and pours upon my breast,
line_2: She comes in all her killing charms confest,

line_1: Bids heav'n's bright guard from Paraclete remove,
line_2: And drags me back to misery and love.

line_1: And drags me back to misery and love.
line_2: Bids heav'n's bright guard from Paraclete remove,

line_1: Enjoy thy triumphs, dear illusion! see
line_2: This sad apostate from his God to thee;

line_2: Enjoy thy triumphs, dear illusion! see

line_2: Ere the last lingering spark of virtue die;

line_2: Yet, yet, frail Abelard! one effort try,

line_1: The deadly charming sorceress controul,
line_2: And spite of nature tear her from thy soul.

line_1: Long has that soul in these unsocial woods,
line_2: Where anguish muses, and where horror broods,

line_1: Where anguish muses, and where horror broods,
line_2: Long has that soul in these unsocial woods,

line_1: From love's wild visionary wishes stray'd,
line_2: And sought to lose thy beauties in the shade,

line_1: And sought to lose thy beauties in the shade,
line_2: From love's wild visionary wishes stray'd,

line_2: Woke the keen pang, and sanctify'd desire;

line_1: Woke the keen pang, and sanctify'd desire;
line_2: Faith dropt a smile, devotion lent her fire,

line_1: Led me enraptur'd to the blest abode,
line_2: And taught my heart to glow with all its God.

line_2: Led me enraptur'd to the blest abode,

line_2: When Eloisa melts away in love!

line_2: And fiercely springs in ecstasies to me.

line_1: And fiercely springs in ecstasies to me.
line_2: Flows thro' her pen as infant softness free,

line_2: With every seraph warm in every vein,

line_2: In that kind hour thy fatal letter came,

line_2: Prophetic tremors shook the hallow'd shrine;

line_1: Prophetic tremors shook the hallow'd shrine;

line_2: And heaven itself shut on me while I read.

line_1: And heaven itself shut on me while I read.

line_1: Dear smiling mischief! art thou still the same,
line_2: The still pale victim of too soft a flame?

line_1: The still pale victim of too soft a flame?
line_2: Dear smiling mischief! art thou still the same,

line_1: Each melting eye-ball mix'd thy soul with mine?

line_2: Curb'd the loose wish, and form'd each pulse to rest?

line_1: And the grasp'd vengeance only waits his nod.
